content: 17. Does anyone else see that white van parked across the street? The one spying on you? It was obviously sent by your company to make sure you’re still working at 2 AM. Luckily, you’ve replicated the look of a despondent and exhausted employee by scrolling through the “trending” videos on YouTube. But just to make sure they know your only purpose in life is your job, you should probably stop leaving your desk to use the bathroom. And sleeping. And leaving the house.
